ygData.subject: Re: Damage
ygData.msgSnippet: That is not correct.  Damage is based on strength and levels, not just levels.  With my troll shadowknight and his BBC I hit for up to 45.   ( 17 * 2 + 11 )
ygData.messageBody:
That is not correct. Damage is based on strength and levels, not just
levels. With my troll shadowknight and his BBC I hit for up to 45. ( 17 *
2 + 11 ) but it changes every level. I have 154 strength with buffs
----- Original Message -----
From: Mifsud, Michael <Michael.Mifsud@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 31, 1999 8:14 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Damage


> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Hi im level 23 now which means, correct me if I am wrong, plus 4 to
damage.
> So my damage now should be 2xbase+5.
>
> I have never seen my damage go above 11 (I use scims with a base damage of
> 5). I consistently get in the 8 to 10 range with the odd 11. I still
even
> get one every now and then against whites.
>
> What am I missing? According to 2xbase+1 formula my range should be 2 to
> 11, at level 23 my range should be 6 to 16. What am I missing? My
natural
> str is 75 but with items I got it to 91.
>
> A frustrated,
>
> Jaade D'Vinn
> Indigo Sista Soldier
>
>
